top.description: The number of records displayed on a page.

TMV1-Query.description:
The filter for retrieving a subset of the collected endpoint information data. 

Supported fields:

|Field|Description|Supported Values|
|-|-|-|
|`agentGuid`|The ID of the endpoint on the Trend Vision One platform.|Any value|
|`loginAccount`|-|Any value|
|`endpointName`|The name of the endpoint.|Any value|
|`macAddress`|The MAC address of the endpoint|Any value|
|`ip`|The IP address of the endpoint|Any value|
|`protectionManager`|The name of your protection manager.|Any value|
|`policyName`|The name of a policy from your protection manager.|Any value|
|`componentUpdatePolicy`|The update policy for the module/pattern of the agent installed on the endpoint.|`n` represents the latest version. `n - x` represents x snapshots prior (Example: `n - 2`).|
|`componentUpdateStatus`|The status of the module/pattern updates of the agent installed on the endpoint.|`pause`, `onSchedule`, `notSupported`|
|`componentVersion`||`outdatedVersion`, `latestVersion`, `controlledLatestVersion`, `unknownVersions`|
|`osName`|The operating system of the endpoint|`Linux`, `Windows`, `macOS`, `macOSX`|
|`osVersion`|The version of the operating system of the endpoint.|Any value|
|`productCode`|The 3-character code that identifies Trend Micro products.|`sao`, `sds`, `xes`|
|`installedProductCodes`|The installed Trend Micro products on an endpoint|`sao`, `sds`, `xes`|

Supported operators:

|Operator|Description|
|-----|--------------------|
|`eq` | Operator 'equal to'|
|`and`| Operator 'and'     |
|`or` | Operator 'or'      |
|`not`| Operator 'not'     |
|`()` | Symbols for grouping operands with their correct operator. |

Note: When generating paginated output, include the `TMV1-Query` parameter in every request.
